Name: Wandering Goblin
Description: Grumbling, stumbling, filthy and ragged, this little green creature's size does little to hide the wanton violence begging to burst at the first thing that looks at him the wrong way. For better or worse, today that happens to be you.

Name: Rival Adventurer
Description: Ah, a fellow adventurer. He's using that whetstone with skill; he has seen a thing or two, and you think you've seen him in town before.

Name: Forgotten Dwarf
Description: Dwarves, or dwarfs? Big beards and heavy boots seem to be their thing. This one doesn't look too happy to see you.

Name: Mighty Stag
Description: A mighty stag stands before you, and you feel the absurd urge to kneel before such a princely animal.

Name: Brigand
Description: Mother warned you about run-ins with strangers on the road. This fellow seems to fit every stereotype, and he reeks of danger and cheap booze.

Name: Bridge Troll
Description: You're crossing a small bridge when it collapses underneath you. After a rough landing, you gaze up at an impossibly large, rocky visage, peerless in its hideousness. "Let me pose you a riddle," it slurs out. How does it know your language?
